Posts.Content: I have survived breast cancer 5 years, then went on to colorectal cancer...perineal resection and permanent colostomy, a year ago last July 18/03. What a difference a year makes! I'm getting back to normal, and changing the appliance I have to wear has become normal routine. There really IS life after cancer, Love. It just ain't easy getting there, but it's Worth it! : - ) I'd like to hear from you but I can't find your message again..I tried message board but no luck I'm Vera, a two time survivor. ps: I'm new at this...still trying to find the message center...
Posts.Title: to Person "desparate Please Help"
